description:
CNN’s Van Jones sat down with a group of Black voters to ask if they had any voter regret. Not only did they say they didn’t, but they also continue to support the president, despite that being politically incorrect.

We all know what the left thinks about these voters: If they don’t vote some type of way, they lose their Black card. Nonetheless, these same people acted as if they had a monopoly on their votes, despite having done nothing meaningful for them ever.

So, while CNN still can’t seem to understand why the left keeps losing support among this demographic, and th
title: Van Jones asks Black Trump Voters If They Regret Their Vote... Things Don't Go As He Expected
